channel.title: Kiki McDonald on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Kiki McDonald on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Disabled Access Day 2016
item.description: MM - Michael McEwan KM - Kiki McDonald MM Now on Iriss.fm I’m joined via Skype by the cofounder of Disabled Access Day Kiki McDonald and she’s going to tell us about what is Disability Access Day. So basically, welcome. The first question I would like to ask is, what is Disabled Access Day? KM So Disabled Access Day is a day where venues are putting on events and incentives to encourage disabled people to come and try them out.
